artist: Artist: Jean-Robert Ango; Artist: Formerly attributed to Jean-Honoré Fragonard; Artist: After Domenichino Zampieri
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: red chalk drawing of a woman at center with her arms out stretched looking skyward; clouds at her feet; flanked by two putti
inscription:
Label

-- label for The Minneapolis Institute of Arts / no. L84.159 / Lent by John E. Andrus, III

-- label for John E. Andrus, III 712 Ontario Avenue West Minneapolis 3, Minnesota / JEAN HONORE FRAGONARD (after Domenichino)

-- in graphite on recto of backing sheet, lower right: 840 Andrus
provenance: [Andrus, at least by 1984]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn., by 1984; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Assumption of the Virgin
